wikipedia_page.main: Barnaby Barford (born 1977), currently lives and works in London is a British artist, best known for his sculptural work using industrially made ceramics in unexpected ways. In the past two years he has been looking at the world through the lens of the Apple. The most humble of all fruits has been there at every stage of the history of humankind – from Adam & Eve to Snow White, through Cézanne, Magritte, and Newton – and it is the perfect vehicle for cultural observation.

response: * Damaged Goods, a 2008 animated film by Barnaby Barford
